channel.title: My first account in 1yr
channel.description:
well im starting a pure and i was woundering what he should be? (btw i have no money so suggest cheap things) i was thinking of being a pure well just getting str and hp? they good? btw my name is [b]gime milk[/b]
[center][size=13pt][b]Off topic[/b][/size] [img]http://www.rshumor.net/showimage.php?id=756[/img]

item.title: My first account in 1yr
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

I’m making a hybrid:
atk:60
str:70+
def:1
rng:70+
pry:52
mge:85+

you should go for:
80
99
70
80
85

Ultimate!

Read full topic

item.title: My first account in 1yr
item.dc:creator: @deoxys505 deoxys505
item.description:
@deoxys505 wrote:

only lvl 59…mage is like 42 and range is like 30 my str is close to 55 or 50 and atk and def are like 47 and 48

my cooking is 57 and my fishing 55 <—highest stat

and my max gp (ever) is 450k

Read full topic

item.title: My first account in 1yr
item.dc:creator: @ozone ozone
item.description:
@ozone wrote:

99 range and 99 mage is the best combination, (entangle then range) or (ice barrage then range)

Read full topic

item.title: My first account in 1yr
item.dc:creator: @deoxys505 deoxys505
item.description:
@deoxys505 wrote:

[quote=“Eh Pretty Easy, post:11, topic:82362”][quote author=deoxys505 link=topic=121064.msg1192087#msg1192087 date=1177183962]

[quote author=Eh Pretty Easy link=topic=121064.msg1192067#msg1192067 date=1177183786]
Merchant, it’s not that hard at all. I have myself turned one feather to [size=15pt]guthan full[/size] two times already. Be determined, and go for what you want. (But don’t spend your life on RS, even I don’t play more than 1,5h a day)
[/quote]are you a member?
[/quote][/quote]sorry thought guthix

and i’m not a member so its kinda hard for me to make money, otherwise, i would be fishing in the fishing guild.

Read full topic

item.title: My first account in 1yr
item.dc:creator: @deoxys505 deoxys505
item.description:
@deoxys505 wrote:

[quote=“Elite2142, post:6, topic:82362”]Meh, I can train with you with my pure as i’m that bored.[/quote]if i can get online today…then i might be able to train with you, because i got a new account that i want to train as a str pure.

i don’t know if its frowned upon here or not, but is it possible that someone could post a good auto fighter for me? i want to auto one of my noob accounts and get him to have high def and str…

i don’t even own full bronze

item.description:
@deoxys505 wrote:

…mage is the best if you can get enough money to fund it, or make your own runes. but if not then i would suggest a str pure,

get str hp to 99 and def and atk to 30 or 40
